title: 7.4.5 Create findings API endpoints and tests
body:
## Parent Issue
#32 - 7.4 Findings Management System

## Endpoints
- GET /api/v1/findings - List with filters
- GET /api/v1/findings/summary - Aggregated summary
- GET /api/v1/findings/:id - Get details
- PUT /api/v1/findings/:id/status - Update status
- GET /api/v1/findings/for-chat - Chat-formatted results

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/api/routers/findings.py`
- `tests/services/test_findings.py`
- `tests/api/test_findings_api.py`

## Estimated Time: 2.5 hours
